name: Events by Category
description:
Check data from yesterday:
1) all required categories have events,
2) there are no events with unexpected category,
3) no required categories have decreased significantly (compared to daily average in the last 28 days)

constants.name: allowedEventCombinations
constants.description: fill the parameters based on the configuration steps below (requiredEventCombinations contains all event combinations that have to be there every day)

constants.name: allowedEventCombinations
constants.description: fill the parameters based on the configuration steps below (allowedEventCombinations contains all event combinations that can be in the data)

constants.name: maxCountUnexpected
constants.description: maximal allowed number of events for an unexpected combination (to display all, set to 0)

constants.name: minShareToDailyAverage
constants.description: minimal allowed share compared to daily average (e.g. for minShareToDailyAverage = 0.4, test fails if any combination has less than 40 % of its daily average)

blocks.description: check that there is no unexpected event
check that no required event has fallen extremely compared to last 28 days
